attachments.text:
Hey there :wave:,

I’ve been busy setting up the basics for Equalify, and I’m excited to share the progress! Here’s a quick rundown of what’s been done:

• *Started off the project*: Got the project up and running with some initial config and tooling.
• *Routing and State*: Set up React Router and React Query for handling our SPA needs, plus Zustand for a bit of global state magic (with some persistence sprinkled in).
• *Auth and APIs*: Got AWS Amplify in place to handle our auth and make talking to APIs smoother.
• *Look and Feel*: Threw in some layout components (`NotFound`, `Footer`, `Header`) and gave our app a fresh coat of paint with TailwindCSS.
• *Testing and Docs*: Added tests for our layout stuff to make sure they play nice (accessibility included) and spruced up the `README.md` and `CHANGELOG.md` so everyone knows what’s up.
• *Some Housekeeping*: Updated `.gitignore`, set up `.env.example` for easy starts, and added some new scripts to `package.json`.

Feel free to dive in, ask questions, or suggest changes. Excited to push this project forward and see where it goes!
attachments.title: <https://github.com/EqualifyEverything/equalify-frontend/pull/2|#2 Feature/initial setup>

Hey there :wave:,

I’ve been busy setting up the basics for Equalify, and I’m excited to share the progress! Here’s a quick rundown of what’s been done:

• *Started off the project*: Got the project up and running with some initial config and tooling.
• *Routing and State*: Set up React Router and React Query for handling our SPA needs, plus Zustand for a bit of global state magic (with some persistence sprinkled in).
• *Auth and APIs*: Got AWS Amplify in place to handle our auth and make talking to APIs smoother.
• *Look and Feel*: Threw in some layout components (`NotFound`, `Footer`, `Header`) and gave our app a fresh coat of paint with TailwindCSS.
• *Testing and Docs*: Added tests for our layout stuff to make sure they play nice (accessibility included) and spruced up the `README.md` and `CHANGELOG.md` so everyone knows what’s up.
• *Some Housekeeping*: Updated `.gitignore`, set up `.env.example` for easy starts, and added some new scripts to `package.json`.

Feel free to dive in, ask questions, or suggest changes. Excited to push this project forward and see where it goes!
